text: Mridula Sinha (27 November 1942 â€“ 18 November 2020) was an Indian writer and politician. Sinha was Governor of Goa from August 2014 to October 2019. She was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. She was born in Muzaffarpur, Bihar, British India. Sinha died on 18 November 2020 at the age of 77.Former Goa Governor Mridula Sinha passes away; PM Modi, Amit Shah condole demise of veteran BJP leader ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Governors of Goa Category:Indian writers
title: Mridula Sinha
